item.title: Artist's special
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 30 ml Scotch
  • 30 ml Oloroso sherry
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml grenadine or redcurrant or raspberry syrup
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Aviation
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 50 ml gin
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • 10 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • 5ml crème de violette (optional)
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Bloody Mary
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml vodka
  • 90 ml tomato juice
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • 2 dashes Worcestershire sauce
  • 2 dashes hot sauce
  • pinch celery salt
  • pinch pepper
  • (garnish) celery stalk
  • (garnish) lemon wedge

Instructions

Build in highball glass over ice. Garnish.

item.title: Brandy crusta
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml brandy
  • 15 ml triple sec
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • 10 ml Maraschino liqueur (optional)
  • 4 dashes aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) sugar
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

Sugar rim a cocktail glass. Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish with long lemon twist lining the inside of the glass.

item.title: Tom Collins
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • soda water
  • (garnish) lemon or lime slice

Instructions

Add ingredients except soda to highball glass and stir to combine. Add soda water to halfway up glass. Fill glass with ice. Garnish.

item.title: Whiskey sour
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml bourbon
  • 30 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 4 dashes orange bitters
  • 1/2 egg white (optional)
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry
  • (garnish) orange twist

Instructions

Dry shake ingredients. Then shake with ice. Serve in a rocks glass over ice. Garnish.
